{{Description|The fireworks of a floating world, the blights and glories of tranquil eternity.|[https://hoyolab.com/article/9078416 Melody of Dreamlike Wanderings]}}
'''Inazuma''' is a soundtrack from the album ''[[Realm of Tranquil Eternity]]''.

It was performed by the [https://www.tpo.or.jp/en/ Tokyo Philharmonic Orchestra] with the title "'''Inazuma Main Theme (Full Concert Version)'''" as seen in [https://youtu.be/avmFhel0ky "Travelers' Musings" &mdash; Behind the Scenes of the Music of Inazuma] (~01:23).

On December 19, 2021, this track was re-released in the [[Featured Original Soundtrack (2021)]], Genshin Impact's first OST album recorded with {{w|Dolby Atmos}} technology.<ref>Twitter: [https://twitter.com/genshinimpact/status/1472423184171343872 Featured Original Soundtrack Announcement]</ref>
